attributes.action: Ban smoking within 100M of any Nursery, School, College or any other learning establishment where children under the age of 16 years attend or visit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition to stop people smoking around and about our schools etc. 
If adults are discouraged from lighting up outside school while waiting to collect children or in the case of teachers while on a break then they cannot set a bad example to impressionable minors.
This will also stop children who smoke from doing so outside schools etc.
